title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Jiff Pom @Jiffpom where Number of followers in millions is 6.6.
The lowest category is found at Manny @manny the frenchie where Number of followers in millions is 1.0.
The highest value at Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is almost 6.6 times larger than the minimum value of Manny @manny the frenchie.
The highest value at Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is almost 6.6 times larger than the minimum value of Manny @manny the frenchie.
The difference between the max Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and min Month Manny @manny the frenchie is 5.6.
